course_description: The purpose of this course is to provide doctoral students with a deep understanding of the conceptual frameworks, values, and assumptions underlying a range of intervention strategies for solving public health problems. The course will also examine intervention design, implementation, and evaluation across various levels of social ecology.
sections: Class Nbr: 5220, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 9-11:50a, Instructor: N. Escoffery, Status: Open
